newsitem.title: CHILE: Economic activity in Chile up 3.4 pct in March.
newsitem.headline: Economic activity in Chile up 3.4 pct in March.

text.p: Economic activity in Chile as measured by the Imacec index expanded 3.4 percent in March over the same month last year and was up from 2.9 percent in February, the Central Bank said.
Though higher than last month's figure, the March statistic was still on the low side of expectations and off sharply from 6.8 percent growth in the same month last year over March 1995.

The Imacec measures economic growth and is considered an early barometer of gross domestic product performance. Quarterly growth figures were due to be released by the Central Bank later Friday morning.
